text: Wally Bristowe (27 April 1922 – 1 March 2013) was a former Australian rules footballer who played with Hawthorn and Fitzroy in the Victorian Football League (VFL). == Notes == == External links == * * Category:1922 births Category:2013 deaths Category:Australian rules footballers from Victoria (Australia) Category:Hawthorn Football Club players Category:Fitzroy Football Club players
title: Wally Bristowe
